welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Isernhagen-Sud, a charming city in Germany known for its beautiful natural landscapes and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanover Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
